display.title: Magic-Themed Tech Mod
description: The &&3Lexica Botania&&r is a guide to magical flora and phenomena.
It details the creation of &&3Flora&&r, including the collection of &&3Mana&&r through &&3Generating Flora&&r, and the various uses of &&3Functional Flora&&r.
In addition, structures and objects capable of &&dstoring and transfering Mana&&r, and consuming it to &&dperform various functions&&r, are covered in detail.
In return, the Lexica shows ways to create and obtain &&dall manner of useful magical equipment and artifacts&&r.
